text.div:
GoalAchievementStatusCanonicalMap (http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/sc-goal-achievement)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-achievement to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-status

DRAFT. Published on 20/08/2020 5:41:31 PM by HL7 International - Patient Care WG (http://www.hl7.org/Special/com...).

Canonical Mapping for "Describes the progression, or lack thereof, towards the goal against the target."


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
in-progress, sustaining, improving, worsening, no-changeis equivalent toactive
achievedis equivalent tocomplete
not-attainableis equivalent toabandoned
no-progress, not-achievedis equivalent tonot-done

title: Canonical Mapping for "Goal achievement status"
